summary: Earl Bassett, now a washed-up ex-celebrity, is hired by a Mexican oil company to eradicate a Graboid epidemic that's killing more people each day. However, the humans aren't the only one with a new battle plan.
cast: Fred Ward|Chris Gartin|Helen Shaver|Michael Gross|Marcelo Tubert|Marco Hernandez|José Ramón Rosario|Thomas Rosales Jr.|S.S. Wilson
keywords: oil refinery|man eaten by monster|man versus monster|second part|creature feature
title: Temblores 2: La respuesta
